For those who have gotten this to work. I never had problems with torrents before. But this one, I seem to download it and install it properly. Then when i launch the game, i get a "Game Folder game not found" error. I searched up on this and found that it may have been the reason that i didn't have a "system.cfg" file in my Crysis 2 folder. This finally allowed me to launch the game, but it launches to a black screen without any audio. And shortly after, the game turns off.

Anyone know a solution?

The singleplayer seems to work well on my win7 64bit despite my mediocre graphics capability.
Thanks.

spudnikkul it sounds like you didnt do it right.the dll is probably in the image,or if your running this proper,you dont need the dll.did you copy the crack into the install directory?if you did and it still isnt working,search your hard drive for that dll,and if you find it,copy and paste into the install directory.you can try searching the web for the dll,but it is rolling the dice,if you know what i mean

#1. install game and updates
Spud, extract iso, look for Prophet folder, copy the dll (with the crysis icon). Go to EA crysis folder,(program files/EA/crysis2) find the same looking ikon dll and remove it. Paste the Prophet dll in it's place.
